answer: Currently, we don't have a specific student discount, but you can use the 'WELCOME' code for a 10% discount on your entire order!

question: Student discount hai kya?
answer: Filhal, hamare paas koi specific student discount nahi hai, lekin aap 'WELCOME' code ka istemal karke apne poore order par 10% ka discount pa sakte hain!

question: Do you have cable management solutions?
answer: Yes, we have an excellent range of cable clips, sleeves, and boxes under 'Desk Organization & Management' to help you tame that cable mess.

question: Cable manage karne ke liye kuch hai?
answer: Haanji, hamare paas 'Desk Organization & Management' category mein cable clips, sleeves, aur boxes ki ek behtareen range hai jo aapko cable mess se chhutkara dilane mein madad karegi.

question: What's the meaning of 'SetupGuru'?
answer: The name 'SetupGuru' reflects our mission to be the expert (Guru) you can trust for creating the perfect desk setup.

question: 'SetupGuru' ka kya matlab hai?
answer: 'SetupGuru' naam hamare mission ko darshata hai - ek aisa expert (Guru) banna jis par aap ek perfect desk setup banane ke liye bharosa kar sakein.

question: How often do you add new products?
answer: We are constantly updating our catalog with new and exciting products. Follow us on Instagram at setupguru.shop to be the first to know!

question: Aap naye products kab add karte ho?
answer: Hum lagatar apne catalog ko naye aur exciting products ke saath update karte rehte hain. Sabse pehle jaanne ke liye hamein Instagram par setupguru.shop par follow karein!

question: What if an item is out of stock?
answer: If an item is out of stock, you can sign up for a notification on the product page. We'll email you as soon as it's back!

question: Agar koi item out of stock hai to?
answer: Agar koi item out of stock hai, to aap product page par notification ke liye sign up kar sakte hain. Jaise hi woh wapas aayega, hum aapko email kar denge!

question: Do you offer faster shipping?
answer: We currently offer standard shipping. We are working on introducing an express shipping option in the future. For more details, visit www.setupguru.shop.

question: Kya aap faster shipping offer karte hain?
answer: Hum abhi standard shipping offer karte hain. Hum bhavishya mein express shipping ka option laane par kaam kar rahe hain. Adhik jaankari ke liye www.setupguru.shop visit karein.

question: Are you hiring?
answer: For any career-related inquiries, please keep an eye on our website or our future LinkedIn page. We appreciate your interest!

question: Koi job vacancy hai?
answer: Kisi bhi career se judi jaankari ke liye, kripya hamari website ya hamare future LinkedIn page par nazar rakhein. Aapki ruchi ke liye dhanyavaad!

question: I can't find a product.
answer: You can use the search bar at the top of our website, www.setupguru.shop, to find exactly what you're looking for. If you still can't find it, it might be out of stock or we may not carry it yet.

question: Mujhe ek product nahi mil raha.
answer: Aap hamari website www.setupguru.shop ke top par search bar ka istemal karke wahi dhoondh sakte hain jo aapko chahiye. Agar aapko phir bhi nahi milta hai, to ho sakta hai ki woh out of stock ho ya hum use abhi nahi bechte hon.

question: What makes your products unique?
answer: Our products are carefully curated for quality, functionality, and style. We focus on items that enhance productivity and comfort at an affordable price.

question: Aapke products ko kya unique banata hai?
answer: Hamare products quality, functionality, aur style ke liye dhyan se chune gaye hain. Hum aise items par focus karte hain jo productivity aur comfort ko behtar banate hain, woh bhi ek affordable price par.

question: Can I get a refund?
answer: Yes, if you are eligible for a return as per our return policy, you can get a refund. Please contact our helpline at 9499473347 for assistance.

question: Kya mujhe refund milega?
answer: Haanji, agar aap hamari return policy ke hisaab se return ke liye eligible hain, to aapko refund milega. Madad ke liye kripya hamare helpline number 9499473347 par contact karein.

question: Do you have any eco-friendly products?
answer: Yes, we are committed to sustainability and offer a selection of eco-friendly products. Look for items made from recycled or sustainable materials on our website.

question: Kya aapke paas koi eco-friendly products hain?
answer: Haanji, hum sustainability ke prati committed hain aur eco-friendly products ka ek selection offer karte hain. Hamari website par recycled ya sustainable materials se bane items ko dekhein.
